Good video quality but the sound is a little bit quiet, you would have to turn the volume good up.
The subs ARE working. With VLC go to "Video", "Subtitles Track" and choose Track1 for Dansk or Track2 for English. They are embedded in the Das Boot (D.C.).mp4 file. Thanks!

VLC Works fine. It's been shown above how to get it work so I won't go into that, but on top of reading just about every video format, it's FREE (and not free as in "I got it from TP" free).

I got this to work on DVD without any hassle. Drag to ConvertxtoDVD3, and check your subtitles. Both Danish and English should be there, I happened to right click Danish and remove it so when I push my audio options button on the remote, English subs pop on. 

Doesn't get much easier than that.
